thread.title: Paper Eskimo Donates to Banner Children's at Cardon Children's Medical Center Stars of the Season Fundraiser
thread.title_full: Paper Eskimo Donates to Banner Children's at Cardon Children's Medical Center Stars of the Season Fundraiser - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Paper Eskimo Donates to Banner Children's at Cardon Children's Medical Center Stars of the Season Fundraiser
text:
Paper Eskimo
The Stars of the Season is a fundraising soiree held for Banner Children's at Cardon Children's Medical Center. It is the largest and most important fundraiser of the year. The sixth annual event will be held on Saturday, October 24th, at the JW Marriott Camelback Inn Resort Spa in Scottsdale, Arizona.
PHOENIX , Oct. 20, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- All funds gathered at the event will go to support the establishment of Sophie's Place at Cardon Children's. Paper Eskimo is donating generously to the event.
Logo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20151019/278260LOGO
The guiding philosophy of the event is 'Music IS Therapy.' Music therapy is about using the power of music to help patients and families triumph over sickness and hospitalization. Music therapy has been show to lower stress and anxiety, control pain, improve expression, and boost morale. It gives children something to look forward to each and every day. They also get the chance to learn about music while becoming musicians themselves. Supporting the 'Music IS Therapy' philosophy of the Stars of the Season fundraiser is supporting a truly meaningful and powerful cause.
Paper Eskimo is a boutique paper party supplies company whose mission is to bring beauty, style, and fun to parties all around the world. With the Stars of the Season fundraiser, Paper Eskimo found a cause they were absolutely delighted to support. A cornerstone of the fundraiser is the auction. Paper Eskimo donated not just party packages, which are perfect for throwing girls or boys' birthday parties, but an entire Alaskan cruise. Paper Eskimo hopes that proceeds generated by the auction will far exceed projections.
The Stars of the Season fundraising auction also includes items like spa and dining packages, signed sports paraphernalia, jewelry, and much more. In addition, once-in-a-lifetime opportunities to meet-and-great professional athletes will be auctioned off.
All the proceeds of the event will help build the country's third largest Sophie's Place at Banner Children's at Cardon Children's Medical Center. The support of pediatric health is one of the highest callings one can answer. Paper Eskimo is delighted to answer the call.
"It isn't just that children are our future, it is that they are sweet, delightful, enthusiastic and strong individuals who need us. They more than deserve the support of the Stars of the Seasons fundraiser, they deserve the support of the entire nation. Making a difference in just one person life makes it all worth it. I hope everyone will come out and donate generously to the event. We can't wait to see you there," said Joanna Palmer , a spokesperson for Paper Eskimo.
About Paper Eskimo
Paper Eskimo's award-winning designs have created joy and memories to many celebrations around the world for the past 10 years. Leading the market with a unique and stylish vision, Paper Eskimo has changed the way people celebrate their events.
